about_the_game:
Tapeheads is a retro-futuristic computer simulation game set in an world where technology took a different path. You receive a replica of the 1983 Sonnenlicht Troika computer system from your uncle. Using the Symbolic79 programming language, solve puzzles sent by your uncle and his friends. Take breaks with included mini-games.

Key Features:
  • Symbolic79 programming language: Custom language with extensive documentation and examples.
  • Interpreter with debugging and REPL: Debug and test your code seamlessly with an interactive interpreter and REPL.
  • Editor with file revisioning: Manage your projects with built-in file revisioning.
  • Mini-games with logic puzzles: Enjoy engaging mini-games.
  • Atmospheric sound and graphics: Immerse yourself in a detailed retro-futuristic system.

About the Demo


  • Only some of the main game's programming puzzles are included.
  • Only demos of two of the mini-game puzzles are included.
  • The in-game magazine is not included.

All other functionality is in place.

Artwork from the In-Game Magazine

  • Editor with file revisioning: Manage your projects with built-in file revisioning.
  • Mini-games with logic puzzles: Enjoy engaging mini-games.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: Intel and Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 14
  • Processor: Intel and Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: 10
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • OS: 11
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Tapeheads is an atmospheric retro-futuristic simulation. Use a one-of-a-kind computer and its unusual programming language to solve puzzles about manipulating data.
